item.title: Laura Fygi - I Love You For Sentimental Reasons
item.description:
I love you for
sentimental reason
I hope you
do believe me
I’ll give you
my heart
I love you
and you alone
Were meant
for me
Please give your
loving heart to me
And say we’ll
never part
I think of you
every morning
Dream of you
every night
Darling I’m
never lonely
Whenever you’re
in sight
I love you for
sentimental reason
I hope you
do believe me
I’ll give you
my heart

I think of you
every morning
Dream of you
every night
Darling I’m
never lonely
Whenever you’re
in sight
I love you for
sentimental reason
I hope you
do believe me
I’ll give you
my heart

item.title: Laura Fygi - Let There Be Love
item.description:
Let there be you
let there be me
Let there be oysters
under the sea
Let there be wind
an occasional rain
Chile con carne
sparkling champagne
Let there be birds
sing in the trees
Someone to bless me
whenever I sneeze
Let there be cuckoos
a lark and a dove
But first of all
please
Let there be
love

Let there be cuckoos
a lark and a dove
But first of all
please
Let there be love
uhm love yeah love
Let there be
love
